description:
A winning combination of chocolate, banana and... crickets. A recognized superfood, cricket flour is loaded with both macro and micro nutrients, giving your body the fuel it needs to push to the summit or set a PR.

  • Ingredients: sugars (dates, brown rice syrup), sunflower seed butter (sunflower seeds, sunflower seed oil), protein blend (pea protein isolate, cricket protein, soy protein isolate, brown rice protein concentrate), chicory root fiber, chocolate chips (organic cane sugar, unsweetened chocolate, cocoa butter), unsweetened chocolate, organic crisp rice (organic rice flour, organic evaporated cane juice, salt, calcium carbonate), banana flakes, cocoa powder, gum acacia, cocoa butter, natural flavours, rolled oats, organic chia seeds, sea salt, mixed tocopherols
  • Cricket protein offers long-lasting energy and is the most sustainable protein source on the market
  • Cricket powder is 2 to 3 times more protein-rich than beef, requires 12x less food, and produces 100x less greenhouse gas
  • Cricket powder has both omega-3 and omega-6 fatty acids
  • Allergens: soy and crickets (which contain the same allergens as shellfish)
  • Non-GMO ingredients
  • Manufactured in a plant that also processes peanuts, eggs, tree nuts, sesame seeds, wheat and milk
name: Naak Banana and Chocolate Energy Bar
